tag_list: entrepreneur, startup, tech, zuldi, turban, sikh, developer
overview:
With over 8 years of entrepreneurial experience, Hartej Singh Sawhney is an ambitious young man with a passion to achieve success. Hartej is the Co-Founder & CEO of Zuldi, a startup developing a next generation tablet payment processing system for restaurants and nightclubs. He is an advisor to Stork Stack, a Chicago based Subscription e-commerce startup. He is former Co-Owner of State Platters a outdoor restaurant started at Penn State University in May 2012, serving Mediterranean and Middle Eastern cuisine. Hartej was a Project Manager at Pixatel Systems Inc, a tech startup based out of San Mateo, California. Hartej is a Musician, he plays the Jori Pakhawaj and is a student of Bhai Baldeep Singh. Hartej graduated from Pennsylvania State University with a B.Sc. in Finance.

Hartej is a hustler, a connector, and he’s always looking for new trends or emerging technologies… if you’ve got em, he wants to know about them.

milestones.description: Heading to Startup Chile to continue building Zuldi
